### Description

- This application allows the user to upload a breast cancer histopathological image and returns the classification result ( benign or malignant ) with percentages of each class based on a deep learning model running in the backend.


- It is 86 % accurate and still being optimized for more precision.



### Tools used 
Python / Flask / CSS3 / HTML
